# The Chalet du Lac, a historic site in Paris since 1904
[Privatize the Chalet du Lac](https://chaletdulac-paris.com/en/contact-chalet-du-lac-paris-vincennes "Privatize the Chalet du Lac")
[ ](https://chaletdulac-paris.com/en/history-of-chalet-du-lac-in-paris-vincennes#lechalet "The Chalet du Lac, a historic site in Paris")
## The Napoleon III era: Birth of the Chalet du Lac
The Chalet du Lac was erected at the end of the 19th century, designed to be a leisure and relaxation space for Parisians seeking fresh air and greenery when the City of Paris granted it a concession on March 16, 1904. Over the years, it has evolved while preserving its original character, becoming a privileged site for various events: receptions, weddings, seminars, or simply to enjoy a peaceful moment in the restaurant or on its terrace.
Napoleon III, wishing to offer a green space and recreation area for the inhabitants of Paris, ordered the development of the Bois de Vincennes as a place for strolling and entertainment. The project included the creation of lakes, walkways, and various recreational facilities. The Chalet du Lac, envisioned as a dining and entertainment venue by one of the lakes, fit perfectly into this vision. It was meant to serve as a resting place for walkers, a reception hall for various events, and a major attraction in the renovated woods.
Nestled in the heart of the Bois de Vincennes, the Chalet du Lac is a true institution, known and recognized for its exceptional setting and unique atmosphere. Surrounded by greenery and offering a breathtaking view of the Saint-Mand√© lake, this emblematic monument stands as an oasis of tranquility and nature, ideal for escaping the urban hustle and bustle in one of the most beautiful parks in Paris, the Bois de Vincennes.
![The Chalet du Lac in Vincennes](https://chaletdulac-paris.com/assets/img/chaletdulac-34.jpg)
![Restaurant with terrace in Paris](https://chaletdulac-paris.com/assets/img/chaletdulac-04.jpg)

![Restaurant with private room in Paris 12th district](https://chaletdulac-paris.com/assets/img/chaletdulac-02.jpg)
## The Chalet du Lac: A testament to Haussmann‚Äôs Paris
As part of the transformations of Paris orchestrated by Prefect Haussmann, the Bois de Vincennes was entirely redeveloped to offer Parisians a leisure and relaxation space, similar to what had been done for the Bois de Boulogne. It is in this context that the Chalet du Lac in Vincennes finds its origins the 16 mars 1904, intended to enrich the social and cultural life of Paris. It reflects the importance given at the time to urban leisure spaces and the improvement of the quality of life of city dwellers.
The architecture and style of the Chalet du Lac reflected the era‚Äôs enthusiasm for picturesque and romantic constructions, often inspired by Swiss chalets, which added to the charm and appeal of the place. The design aimed to integrate harmoniously into the natural landscape of the woods, using materials and forms evoking elegant rusticity.
The Chalet du Lac also stands out for its elegant Belle √âpoque glass marquise. This masterpiece, a true ode to the finesse and art de vivre of the late 19th century, embodies the harmony between aesthetics and functionality. With its delicate wrought metal structure, typical of Art Nouveau, and its glass panels that filter light gracefully, the marquise creates an enchanting transition between the verdant outdoors and the welcoming interior of the chalet.
## The saga of the Chalet du Lac, from the Sex Pistols to Philippe Starck
The Club Chalet Du Lac in Paris, originally a disco, was renovated into a concert hall with the help of Malcolm McLaren to host the Sex Pistols on September 3 and 5, 1976. When the Sex Pistols made their debut in Paris. The first concert attracted more than 2,000 people. These concerts marked the history of punk music, both in the UK and in France, introducing a passionate and energetic style that became a key moment for the French punk scene.
The Chalet du Lac in Paris is also famous for its dance floor under a huge Philippe Starck-designed disco ball. This iconic piece gives a unique touch to the space, offering a wide range of artistic activities from historical tea dances to modern clubbing nights [Best clubbing nights in Paris](https://chaletdulac-paris.com/en/clubbing-nights-night-club-paris "Best clubbing nights in Paris").

The transformation of the Bois de Vincennes
## The advent of the Chalet du Lac
The Chalet du Lac quickly became a favorite spot for Parisian society of the time, attracting not only walkers but also more formal events. It symbolized the taste of the era for urban green spaces, outdoor entertainment, and conviviality, while reflecting Napoleon III‚Äôs desire to modernize and beautify Paris.
This legendary place elegantly combines history, nature, and gastronomy. The Chalet du Lac restaurant offers refined cuisine, prepared with fresh, seasonal products, inviting to a memorable culinary experience in a sumptuous setting.

In the heart of Paris, the Chalet du Lac stands out as an emblematic address for those looking to celebrate events in an exclusive and refined setting. The Tournesol Room, which can be semi-private, is intended for private meals, conferences, and receptions. Thanks to its large windows opening onto the veranda and terraces, it offers an unparalleled view of the Saint-Mand√© lake and the Bois de Vincennes.

Whatever the occasion, our private rooms provide the perfect setting for your evenings with guests and make your private event unforgettable. Accessible by public transport, just a 5-minute walk from the Saint-Mand√© station on line 1, the Chalet du Lac also offers 60 on-site parking spaces with its private parking.

Job Offer Vincennes
# Deputy Chef M/F
Mar 12, 2024
**Le Chalet du Lac** is a renowned establishment located in Vincennes, known for its high-quality cuisine. We are dedicated to providing an exceptional culinary experience to our customers and are proud of our passionate and professional team.
### Mission:
As a Sous-chef, you will play a key role in the daily management of our kitchen, working closely with the Head Chef to ensure operational excellence. You will be involved in menu creation, meal preparation, and kitchen team management to ensure customer satisfaction.
### Responsibilities:
  * Assist the Head Chef in overseeing all kitchen activities
  * Contribute to menu development and the creation of new dishes
  * Ensure adherence to hygiene and food safety standards
  * Supervise and train kitchen team members
  * Manage stock and culinary supply orders
  * Stand in for the Head Chef in their absence


### Desired Profile:
  * Significant experience as a Sous-chef or similar position
  * A passion for cooking and creativity
  * Excellent leadership and team management skills
  * In-depth knowledge of hygiene and food safety standards
  * Ability to work in a fast-paced and high-pressure environment
  * Professional culinary training is desirable


### We Offer:
  * A dynamic and stimulating work environment
  * The opportunity to work with a passionate and talented team
  * Professional development and training opportunities
  * Competitive salary, negotiable based on experience


### Application:
Send your resume and cover letter by email. We look forward to welcoming you to our team!

## Designed as a large country guest house
The Chalet du Lac combines the enhanced charm of an iconic gathering place of yesteryear with a gourmet and festive program, half retro, half contemporary!

# 120 Years Deserve a Celebration! Birthday Weekend
##  Mar 23, 2024
**Join us to celebrate a historic milestone: the 120th anniversary of Chalet du Lac!** Since its foundation in 1904, our venue has witnessed countless unforgettable moments, and we are thrilled to invite you to our Anniversary Weekend on Saturday, March 23, and Sunday, March 24, 2024.
"120 years are definitely worth celebrating!" To mark this exceptional event, Chalet du Lac will be open all weekend, promising a celebration full of surprises and memorable moments. Come and share with us this significant milestone and dive into the history and unique ambiance of our establishment.
During this festive weekend, we offer you a special "gavroche" dinner, reflecting the authenticity and tradition that characterize our chalet. Choose between our two specially designed menus for the occasion: a complete menu at ‚Ç¨49, including an appetizer, a main course, and a slice of the anniversary cake, or an option at ‚Ç¨39, offering an appetizer and a main course or a main course and a slice of the cake.
**Experience a piece of history with us and let yourself be carried away by the festive spirit that will animate the Chalet all weekend. This is a unique opportunity to celebrate together 120 years of gatherings, sharing, and conviviality.** Book now to secure your spot for this unforgettable anniversary weekend. We are eager to share with you many more surprises and to celebrate together these 120 years of success and shared happiness!

Former hunting lodge of Napoleon III
Chalet du Lac, a historic & legendary place
Chalet du Lac, located at the edge of the Bois de Vincennes in Paris, is a historic institution dating back to the late 19th century. Originally designed as a hunting lodge under Napoleon III and then a guinguette to welcome the wood‚Äôs strollers, it quickly became renowned for its bucolic setting and convivial atmosphere. Featuring the most exotic and verdant terrace in the capital.
In 1860, Napoleon III ceded a part of the Bois de Vincennes to the city of Paris to transform this hunting ground into a place for strolling. The Parisians from the suburbs came there to cool off, play p√©tanque, and row on the Saint-Mand√© Lake.
Chalet du Lac opened to the public in 1904. As a waterside guinguette, it became known for its large tango orchestras during the roaring twenties, its post-war popular dances, and the disco vibe that made its dance floors famous.
More recently, the renowned designer Philippe Starck added his touch by installing a monumental 3-ton disco ball at the center of Chalet du Lac‚Äôs dance hall, considered the largest disco ball in Europe.

Conceived as a large country guest house, Chalet du Lac combines the enhanced charm of a legendary place of old gatherings with a gourmet and festive program, half-retro, half-contemporary!

From appetizers in the sun to a gourmet dinner among connoisseurs, the house welcomes its daytime guests and evening epicureans around a modern and friendly Trattoria-style offering.
Lunch on the terrace, brunch facing the lake, private dinner... Every weekend, Chalet du Lac opens the doors of its restaurant for a moment of friendliness, at the calm edge of the Woods, or facing the dance floor.

# boom boom disco
##  May 31, 2025
**Every Saturday,** the Club du Chalet du Lac invites you to travel back in time and dance the night away at our flagship event: "La Boum"! Get ready for unforgettable evenings where music transcends eras and unites all generations.
**diner at 8 PM**
**Starting at 10 PM** , the party kicks up a notch and the club comes alive until the early morning light. Be swept away by the best DJs spinning an explosive mix of hits from the 60s to today. 
Sing along to the anthems that have marked your life, from Boney M to France Gall, from Michael Jackson to Jean-Jacques Goldman. Our "time-traveling hit machine" from 10 PM guarantees a playlist so irresistible that you won't have a minute to rest.
The Club du Chalet du Lac is the perfect place for those who want to relive their fondest musical memories while creating new unforgettable ones. Whether you're a 60s nostalgist, an 80s fan, or a lover of today's hits, you'll find your groove on our dance floor.
Don't miss out on "La Boum" every Saturday at the Club du Chalet du Lac. Come experience a unique event where music brings hearts and dance steps together. Book your evening now and prepare to journey through the decades in song!

# diner club: saturday night
##  Jun 7, 2025
Every Saturday, the Club du Chalet du Lac invites you to travel back in time and dance the night away at our flagship event: "La Boum"! Get ready for unforgettable evenings where music transcends eras and unites all generations. 
diner at 8 PM 
Starting at 10 PM, the party kicks up a notch and the club comes alive until the early morning light. Be swept away by the best DJs spinning an explosive mix of hits from the 60s to today. 
Sing along to the anthems that have marked your life, from Boney M to France Gall, from Michael Jackson to Jean-Jacques Goldman. Our "time-traveling hit machine" from 10 PM guarantees a playlist so irresistible that you won't have a minute to rest. 
The Club du Chalet du Lac is the perfect place for those who want to relive their fondest musical memories while creating new unforgettable ones. Whether you're a 60s nostalgist, an 80s fan, or a lover of today's hits, you'll find your groove on our dance floor. 
Don't miss out on "La Boum" every Saturday at the Club du Chalet du Lac. Come experience a unique event where music brings hearts and dance steps together. Book your evening now and prepare to journey through the decades in song!

# The Chalet du Lac in Vincennes: a commitment to sustainability certified by ISO 14001
##  Dec 27, 2024
Nestled in the heart of the Bois de Vincennes, the Chalet du Lac stands out not only for its exceptional setting but also for its firm commitment to environmental stewardship, as evidenced by its ISO 14001 certification. This distinction underscores the adoption of rigorous ecological practices and sustainable management, making the Chalet du Lac a model of eco-responsibility in the hospitality and events industry.Recognized ecological commitmentThe ISO 14001 certification awarded to the Chalet du Lac attests to effective and responsible environmental management. This international standard requires the establishment to identify, control, and continually improve its environmental impact. For visitors and clients of the Chalet du Lac, this translates into the assurance of services that adhere to strict environmental standards while offering a superior quality experience.Benefits of ISO 14001 CertificationAdopting the ISO 14001 standard offers multiple benefits for both the establishment and its clients. It ensures a significant reduction in the Chalet du Lac's ecological footprint through better waste management, optimized resource use, and reduced pollutant emissions. This certification also fosters innovation in sustainable practices, placing the establishment at the forefront of eco-friendly trends in the sector.An idyllic environmentally respectful settingBy choosing the Chalet du Lac for their events or dining experiences, clients actively support a business that is committed to environmental preservation. The Chalet du Lac's ISO 14001 certification is not just a mark of quality and ecological respect; it also reflects a corporate philosophy that values sustainability and harmony with nature.The Chalet du Lac in Vincennes, with its ISO 14001 certification, represents an ideal destination for those looking to combine enjoyment with environmental respect. By favoring a certified establishment, clients support eco-responsible initiatives and promote green practices, thus contributing to a more sustainable future. The Chalet du Lac positions itself not just as a venue for relaxation and celebration but also as a proactive participant in fostering a healthy and preserved environment.

# Dining Room Manager (M/F), Waiter/Waitress (M/F)
Mar 12, 2024
## Le Chalet du Lac in Vincennes is Hiring!
Join our enchanting team by the water!
We are currently seeking passionate talents to complete our dynamic team at Le Chalet du Lac, an idyllic restaurant nestled in the heart of the Bois de Vincennes. Seize the opportunity to work in an exceptional setting, offering breathtaking views of the lake and a serene environment.
## Dining Room Manager (M/F)
As the dining room manager, you will be the soul of our restaurant, ensuring an unforgettable client experience through your leadership, organizational skills, and passion for hospitality.
### Responsibilities:
  * Supervise and coordinate the dining room team to ensure impeccable service.
  * Manage reservations and client reception.
  * Ensure adherence to quality and service standards.
  * Work closely with the head chef and management team to optimize the customer experience.


### Qualifications:
  * Significant experience in a similar position.
  * Excellent communication and management skills.
  * Passion for customer service and the restaurant industry.
  * Ability to work in a dynamic environment.


## Waiter / Waitress (M/F)
As a waiter/waitress, your role will be crucial in orchestrating a smooth and memorable service, contributing to the welcoming and warm atmosphere of our establishment.
### Responsibilities:
  * Greet and advise customers courteously.
  * Take orders and serve food and beverages with professionalism.
  * Maintain the cleanliness of the dining area and workstations.
  * Collaborate effectively with the kitchen and dining room teams.


### Qualifications:
  * Experience in a restaurant service role is preferred.
  * Excellent presentation and a positive attitude.
  * Ability to work in a team and under pressure.
  * Attention to detail and customer-oriented.


### We offer:
  * A unique and pleasant work environment.
  * Professional development opportunities.
  * Competitive remuneration and associated benefits.


Apply now to be part of our adventure at Le Chalet du Lac!
Send your CV and cover letter mentioning the position you are interested in. We look forward to meeting you and exploring our collaborative opportunities together.

# sunday brunch
##  Jun 1, 2025
Le Chalet du Lac offers you an unforgettable brunch experience every Sunday. Enjoy an all-you-can-eat buffet in a friendly and warm atmosphere, where young and old can enjoy themselves. 
On the menu: 
Fresh salads: a variety of choices for lovers of crunchy vegetables. 
Crispy pastries: pain au chocolat, croissants and other delights to start the day. 
Tasty hot dishes: options that will satisfy all your desires. 
Delicate desserts: an assortment of sweets to end the meal on a sweet note. 
In addition, for children, an entertainer will be present to liven up their afternoon and entertain them, allowing parents to fully enjoy their brunch. 
Come and spend a moment of pure happiness with family or friends in a welcoming setting!
